News.description:
Rejected by Peter Richardson

You may recall that a year or so ago I published a letter from Peter where he was applying for the managers job, I also revealed my reply and then eventually the fact that Peter was in the process of writing to every football league club with the same request.

He has now published a book containing all these letters, which apart from the first few are all different,  along with replies, where he got one. I have now read most of the book, and I must say that I find it very funny, several times I have actually laughed out loud, in fact so much so that my wife is urging me to finish the book so that she can read it.

I have bought and paid for 50 copies of this book and donated 48 of them to the club shop to sell ( the other 2 are my sons Christmas presents, I hope they don't read this and spoil the surprise) The retail price shown on the book is £7.99 each, we are offering them at a discounted price of £6.99 each, anyone wishing to buy 2 copies or more as presents can have them for £6.00 each. The total proceeds from the sale of these books will stay in the club.

Peter has informed me that he is being interviewed on Talk Sport on 27th October, between 1.30 - 2.00pm and he has promised to mention Dagenham and Redbridge, I think that's because I was the only one to offer him a job, whoops that's a spoiler.

If you have a good sense of humour, I believe you will enjoy reading this book.

Regards Dave Bennett
